div.div: We are not available at this time. Please fill out the form below and an enrollment consultant will contact you within 48 hours or less. Thank you.

div.span:
Enrollment for the 2020–2021 school year is now open!
Apply today>>

We’re accepting immediate enrollment for the current school year.
Enroll today!

#EverySchoolDayCounts – From day 1 until the last day of school, attendance matters!
Go>>

The Annual Education Report (AER) is available.
View PDF!

Find college and career options all in one place with Tallo!
Learn more.

Responding to the Coronavirus:
Learn What You Can Do

div.p: We are now accepting enrollment applications for school years 2019–2020 and 2020–2021. Visit our "How to Enroll" pages to learn more.

div.p: Because our staff is hired through a third party our staff does not currently work under Bargaining Agreements.
Because our staff is hired through a third party vendor, we currently do not sponsor health care plans for our staff.

a.title: PDF opens in a new window

div.p: Because our staff is hired through a third party vendor, we have no medical benefit plan bids.
div.h2: Accounts Payable Check Register or Statement of Reimbursed Expenses

a.title: PDF Opens in a new window

div.p:
Head of School Medicare Wage Data for 2019: $110,539.18
Benefits: Medical - $13,166.14; Dental - $567.86; Vision - $50.18; AD&D - $7.28; Life Insurance - $30.16; STD - $225.04; LTD - $160.60; 401K - $840.16

a.title: PDF Opens in a new window

div.p: The school did not incur any district paid lobbying cost in fiscal year 2018-2019.
The district has not incurred a deficit.
The district does not have district credit cards.
The school did not incur any district paid out-of-state travel costs in fiscal year 2018-2019.
div.h2: Educator Evaluation Systems Postings and Assurances

em.br: Families do not pay tuition for a student to attend an online public school. Common household items and office supplies like printer ink and paper are not provided. Our enrollment consultants can help address your technological and computer questions and needs.

div.p: Copyright © 2020 Insight School of Michigan. All rights reserved.
